game.title: Mystery of Dracula
game.synopsis: Unravel the dark secrets of Count Dracula in this thrilling adventure game.
game.beginning: The game begins with the player arriving at Castle Dracula, having been summoned by a mysterious letter from the count himself.
game.ending: The final showdown with Count Dracula reveals his true form and motives, leading to a climactic battle and the ultimate fate of the player's character.
